definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Article 100 The provisions of all articles in this Section shall apply to the questioning of victims.
sentences.chinese: 第一百条询问被害人，适用本节各条规定。

sentences.english: The victim's participation in the criminal lawsuit is still limited to his role as a witness.
sentences.chinese: 被害人对刑事诉讼的参与仍停留在证人的角色上。

sentences.english: The second part annotates the theory of assistance system of criminal victim.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分，对刑事被害人援助制度的理论进行诠释。

sentences.english: Swindles after the ill-gotten money, is detained and returns the victim completely.
sentences.chinese: 所骗取的赃款后被全部扣押并发还被害人。

sentences.english: The study about droits protection of the injured party is necessary and urgent.
sentences.chinese: 对被害人权利保护价值的探求必要而迫切。

sentences.english: Onlya victim or his family can initiate a court action.
sentences.chinese: 只有被害人或他的家族可以启动一个庭审程序。

sentences.english: The lawful property of the victims shall be returned to them without delay.
sentences.chinese: 对被害人的合法财产，应当及时返还。

sentences.english: It turns out that the victim asked the couple, surnamed Chang, to buy lottery tickets.
sentences.chinese: 原来是被害人委讬张姓夫妻购买彩券。

sentences.english: At present, China's criminal victim compensation is still a blank field.
sentences.chinese: 目前，我国有关刑事被害人补偿的立法尚付阙如。

sentences.english: The judges decided to hear the case in a private session in consideration of the victim's privacy.
sentences.chinese: 法官考虑到被害人的隐私决定不公开审理。

sentences.english: Chapter five, the design of the appeal right of the victim.
sentences.chinese: 第五章被害人上诉权的探索设计。

sentences.english: Finally summarized the victim to study to the criminal detection significance.
sentences.chinese: 最后概括了被害人研究对刑事侦查的意义。

sentences.english: Presumptive victim's commitment is a cause of justification under special circumstance.
sentences.chinese: 推定的被害人承诺是特殊情况下的正当化事由。

sentences.english: Three of them throttled th’ victims like this.
sentences.chinese: 其中三起谋杀案的被害人都是这样被扼死的。

sentences.english: The People's Procuratorate shall notify the victim of its decision made after reexamination.
sentences.chinese: 人民检察院应当将复查决定告知被害人。

sentences.english: The victim was found lying dead on the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 发现被害人倒毙于河岸。

definition: victim (of a criminal)/party involved (in a dispute etc)/main instigator
to make an appearance in court
to investigate a crime on the spot/to occur (of a crime)/to be discovered (of a crime)
(of a perpetrator, victim, weapon, sum of money etc) to be involved in the case
